introduction: 普恩偷偷爱上了她英俊的朋友昂，而昂有男友。但是当他们分手时，她想知道:她和昂还有机会吗？Punn is secretly in love with her handsome friend, Ong -- who has a boyfriend. But when they break up, she wonders: Does she have any chance with Ong?
